message: We're excited to offer you our premium product for $10000. Given its high quality, we believe it offers exceptional value. Please consider this investment in superior craftsmanship and functionality.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, I'd like to pass on this round.

I'll take a chance on this one, but I'm not committing to anything just yet.
